tool_description: Analyzes vendor financial stability and health using credit reports, financial statements, and market indicators.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for the vendor to analyze

analysis_scope.description: Scope of financial analysis: basic, comprehensive, or due_diligence

financial_data_sources.description: Preferred financial data sources to use

risk_tolerance.description: Risk tolerance level: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Vendor not found: The specified vendor_id does not exist
Invalid analysis scope: Must be one of [basic, comprehensive, due_diligence]
Invalid risk tolerance: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
Financial data unavailable: Unable to retrieve sufficient financial information for analysis
Credit report access denied: Unable to access credit reporting services
usage: Specify vendor_id and analysis_scope. Set risk_tolerance based on your organization's risk appetite for vendor financial stability.

liquidity_assessment.description: Liquidity assessment: strong, adequate, weak, or concerning

profitability_trend.description: Profitability trend: improving, stable, declining, or volatile

financial_risk_level.description: Financial risk level: low, medium, high, or critical

analysis_summary.description: Summary of financial health analysis and key findings
